description: A lightweight easy-to-use library for persisting settings using different backing storage implementations. This library contains implementations using an XML file or the Registry as backing storage.
releaseNotes: All group and key arguments are objects instead of strings, providing increased flexibility for arguments types. For example, you can conveniently use Enum values for group and key arguments instead of hard-coded strings. The change is backwards compatible and no other logic changes were made.
summary: A lightweight library for persisting settings.
